title: 76/123. Observer status for the International Solar Alliance in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/76/123
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
17 December 2021 
 
21-18682 (E)    271221   
*2118682* 
 
 
Seventy-sixth session 
Agenda item 176 
Observer status for the International Solar Alliance in the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 9 December 2021 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/76/497, para. 8)] 
 
 
 76/123. Observer status for the International Solar Alliance in the 
General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the 
International Solar Alliance, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the International Solar Alliance to participate in the 
sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;  
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
49th plenary meeting 
9 December 2021

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the International Solar Alliance to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution. 49th plenary meeting 9 December 2021
